oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The importance of physical health in veterinary medicine
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shine, Keely
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: health
fitness
well-being
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Veterinary medicine, while rewarding, is a physically demand­ing profession. This paper explores the significance of physical health in veterinarians, drawing parallels between animal and human well-being. It delves into the challenges veterinarians face, presents relevant statistics, and proposes preventive mea­sures and management strategies to ensure the longevity and effectiveness of veterinary professionals.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; Vol. 58 No. 58 (2024): 2024 AABP Annual Conference Proceedings; 118-119
